message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to part with it for $12000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to consider that?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $8000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10500. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your previous offer of $12000, so I'll offer $9500. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to consider your offer, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9500. I'll offer you a compromise at $10250. What do you think?

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your previous offer of $10250, so I'll offer $10000. This is my final offer, I'm not willing to go any higher. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
